name: Fieldwork: Duplicate Invoice Detection - Fieldwork
description: Automated and manual checks to identify duplicate invoice payments within the Accounts Payable process.

data.label: Data Extraction & Preparation
data.description: Extract and clean AP invoice data for the audit period.
data.instructions: Extract AP invoice data including Invoice Number, Date, Amount, and Vendor ID. Clean data for consistency (e.g., date formats, trimming spaces).

data.label: Exact Match Screening
data.description: Identify identical duplicates based on Vendor ID, Invoice #, and Amount.
data.instructions: Run a query to find records with identical Vendor ID, Invoice Number, and Amount.

data.label: Fuzzy Match & Heuristic Analysis
data.description: Use fuzzy logic to find near-matches, typos, and split invoices.
data.instructions: Use fuzzy string matching on invoice numbers and look for split invoices (same vendor/amount, different invoice #).

data.label: Validation & Investigation
data.description: Investigate flagged items and confirm if payments were actually duplicated.
data.instructions: Compare flagged items against bank statements or payment records to confirm actual double payment.

data.label: Root Cause & Reporting
data.description: Quantify findings and recommend process improvements.
data.instructions: Determine if duplicates were caused by system errors or manual entry. Quantify the financial impact.
